content: the crochet girl gnome is the perfect pattern to compliment any gnome collection she looks adorable in either her floppy-brimmed hat rolled up in the front to reveal her adorable round button-like nose or her more pointed hat the heart flower and clover options for accessorizing her hat make her perfect not only for valentine s day saint patrick s day and spring decor but customizable for any occasion the crochet girl gnome is excellent for gifts gnome lovers and collectors imaginative play valentine s day saint patrick s day spring decor and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet standing single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet increase and decrease invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet working in the front and back loop only bobble stitch the invisible finish and the adjustable magic ring + hand embroidery is optionally used in this project to replace buttons materials needed more specifics are noted within the pattern + yarn in your choice of colors about 245-260 yds/224-238 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + two 9 mm round buttons or one 12 mm heart button optional + sewing thread coordinating with buttons/bows if using finished measurements using hook size e/4 3 5 mm and worsted yarn variations 1 and 2 of the girl gnome measures approximately 9 5 inches 24 cm from the bottom of the foot to the top of the hat and variation 3 measures approximately 12 inches 30 5 cm from the bottom of the foot to the top of the hat the miniature girl gnomes in the images were made using the same pattern with a 1 50 mm hook and size 10 crochet thread variations 1 and 2 measure approximately 5 inches 13 cm from the bottom of the foot to the top of the hat and variation 3 measures approximately 6 inches 15 cm from the bottom of the foot to the top of the hat thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here on ravelry and the blog at www jenhayescreations com copyright this pattern and
